item.title: BBBBBB, a VVVVVV inspired game written in C with SDL2
item.description: Inspired by Terry Cavanagh's recent open-sourcing of indie hit VVVVVV, I wrote my own take on the gravity flip platformer in C with SDL2

item.title: How I made this custom static site blog using only Go Web Templates and TOML
item.description: I started a personal blog. My first post is titled: How I made this custom static site blog using only Go Web Templates and TOML
